title: Correction: Inferring school district learning modalities during the COVID-19 pandemic with a hidden Markov model
content: by Mark J. Panaggio, Mike Fang, Hyunseung Bang, Paige A. Armstrong, Alison M. Binder, Julian E. Grass, Jake Magid, Marc Papazian, Carrie K. Shapiro-Mendoza, Sharyn E. Parks
